about_the_game:
In a world on the brink of destruction, one unlikely hero steps forward. KIDD, a young martial artist as swift with punches and kicks as he is with delivering your pizza, is humanity’s last hope. Pizza Kidd pulses with the spirit and edginess of 90s anime and the grit of classic arcade brawlers of the same era, blending beautifully detailed 16-bit pixel art with fast-paced, responsive combat. This isn’t just another "indie" game—it’s an electrifying homage to a golden era, crafted with love and modern flair to keep things feeling fresh yet familiar.


Santos, the sinister architect behind the city's destruction, now commands an army of nightmares: creepy creature clones, zombified scarecrow ninjas that strike without warning, drone bots that patrol the gates, and towering monstrous behemoths that crush everything in their path. The streets are crawling with terror, but KIDD’s mission is clear—recover the 8 sacred seed stones, harness their power, and put an end to Santos' reign of madness.




Unleash the Action

• High-Impact Combat: Fast, responsive attacks, air juggling, and long chain combos for intense gameplay.

• Side-Scrolling Adventure: Expansive 2D levels with skill-based, fighting-style special moves.

Retro Pixel Brilliance

• Vivid 16-Bit Art: Hand-drawn, comic-style pixel art with detailed stages, big character sprites, and explosive effects.

Sound that Hits

• Arcade Crunch Sound Design: Satisfying impact with every hit.

• Epic Soundtrack by Kevin Ripley: Original music that amplifies the energy and action.

#PIZZAKIDD*Please note: The Pizza Kidd Steam demo is still in active development.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 64-bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD FX-4300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan support, 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: glibc 2.17+, 64-bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan support, 2GB VRAM
  • Sound Card: Stereo

short_description: Kidd Games presents: an all new, stylish, combat driven 2-D beat-em-up set in a dark sci-fantasy world—featuring uniquely drawn 16-bit pixel art with an aesthetic heavily inspired by 90's anime, graphic novels, and quarter munching arcade brawlers.
